title: Quotes About Doing Business in the 21st Century

quotes.author: William L. McKnight, former president and chairman of the board of 3M*
quotes.text: Management that is destructively critical when mistakes are made kills initiative. And it’s essential that we have many people with initiative, if we are to continue to grow.
quotes.tweet: Management that is critical when mistakes are made kills initiative. Which is essential if we are to continue to grow

quotes.author: Samuel_Beckett
quotes.text: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.
quotes.tweet: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better. - Samuel_Beckett

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.text: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.tweet: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed. - Michael Jordan

quotes.author: Peter Senge
quotes.text: In the long run, the only sustainable source of competitive edge is your organisation's ability to learn faster than its competitors
quotes.tweet: In the long run, the only sustainable competitive edge is your org's ability to learn faster than its competitors

quotes.author: Murphy
quotes.text: Anything that can go wrong, will go wrong
quotes.tweet: Anything that can go wrong, will go wrong

quotes.author: Antione de Saint-Exupéry
quotes.text: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work, and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea. As for the future, your task is not to forsee it, but to enable it.
quotes.tweet: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up men and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the endless sea

quotes.author: Jurgen Appelo
quotes.text: If the purpose of your business is merely growth, from a scientific perspective we could call it a tumor.
quotes.tweet: If the purpose of your business is just growth, from a scientific perspective we could call it a tumor -@jurgenappelo

quotes.author: Fried and Hansson
quotes.text: Policies are organizational scar tissue. They are codified overreations to situations that are unlikely to happen again.
quotes.tweet: Policies are organizational scar tissue. They are codified overreations to situations unlikely to happen again

quotes.author: Peter Drucker
quotes.text: There is only one valid definition of business purpose: to create a customer.
quotes.tweet: There is only one valid definition of business purpose: to create a customer. - Peter Drucker
